headline: Is Now the Moment to Reassess Ameren After an 18% Share Price Rise in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Ameren could be offering hidden value right now? You are not alone, as many investors are taking a closer look given the stock’s recent moves. Ameren shares have seen a steady rise so far this year, climbing 18.5% over the past 12 months and 18.0% year-to-date, despite more muted action of 0.4% over the last 7 days. Much of this momentum has been driven by industry-wide shifts in utilities, including new infrastructure initiatives and a heightened interest in renewable energy...
